name: One Last Quest
description:
Play as four adventurers delving a dungeon to destroy the evil residing within an ancient catacomb.
Made by Christoph Maureder, Eyal Harris, Hanna Kołodziejczyk, and Cecilia Ackerman.

University of Europe for Applied Sciences

This game was created at the Game Design // UE at the University of Europe for Applied Sciences. 

Supervised by: Prof. Lena Falkenhagen

WiSe2022 // Game`n`Play
